short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly share web content like a page, a link, an image, or a piece of text directly to Telegram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
== How to use ==

➤ To share a page, click on the extension icon in the toolbar or right-click on an empty space on the page and select "Share page to Telegram". For faster sharing, assign a keyboard shortcut in chrome://extensions/shortcuts, such as ALT + T.

➤ To share a link, an image, or a piece of text, right-click on it and select the appropriate option.

➤ Quick tip: the first time you share, check the box to allow the browser to open links in Telegram. Alternatively, set it up beforehand: https://t.me/share/url?url=Test%20message

== Why PaperJet? ==

➤ Time-saving solution.
➤ No unnecessary permissions.
➤ No background processes; the extension only works when content is being shared.
➤ Constant updates; the extension is improved with Telegram.

Overall, PaperJet is an unofficial extension created by a Telegram fan for Telegram fans. Have any feedback or suggestions? Feel free to leave a review here or send me a message in Telegram: @rodivilin.
